title: GetEventAlarmID (Method)
text:
METHOD GetEventAlarmID : BOOL
This method gets information about an Event-Alarm of a certain module.

rows.Name: GetEventAlarmID
rows.Comment:
The return value indicates whether an Event-Alarm could be
found.

rows.Name: inst
rows.Comment: The module instance the Event-Alarm belongs to.

rows.Name: alarmGroupID
rows.Comment: The alarm-groupId of the found Event-Alarm

rows: The alarmId of the found Event-Alarm
